Pre-Game Insights: The Indonesian national team has improved significantly under Shin Tae-yong's management and is ready to improve the meeting record against Bahrain.
The last meeting between the two teams ended with a 10-0 loss for Indonesia in 2012, but the current Indonesian team is much stronger and different from that time.
The Indonesian national team aims to secure three points and improve their qualification chances for the 2026 World Cup.
Bahrain needs to be wary as the Indonesian national team is now prepared to challenge them.
